
Hook used to update the dynamic environment

The env hook is called during your shell prompt to set the dynamic environment required for
omni up-ed repositories.

Usage: omni hook env [OPTIONS]

Options:
  --quiet <QUIET>            Suppress the output of the hook showing information about the
                             dynamic environment update.
  --keep-shims <KEEP_SHIMS>  Keep the shims directory in the PATH. This is useful for instance
                             if you are used to launch your IDE from the terminal.

Source: builtin
